normal_quests.title: Mr. Brunnen's Siege
normal_quests.flavor_text: Lumbar requested that I make a present for his matchmaking partner. Honestly, I am reluctant... But Lumbar sure has changed, coming to me with alchemy requests.
normal_quests.flavor_text_after: I gave Lumbar the present he asked for. I hope things go smoothly. Come to think of it, there was talk about Bos having an arranged marriage as well... He can probably manage on his own though. Surely.

achievement_condition.detail_text: Synthesize Gnade Ring with quality above 80.

normal_quests.flavor_text: Lumbar requested that I make a present for his matchmaking partner. Honestly, I am reluctant... But Lumbar sure has changed, coming to me with alchemy requests.

normal_quests.title: Seeking Innovation
normal_quests.flavor_text: A Sardonican craftsperson asked me to share some materials from the Kark Isles. They must be pretty dedicated to come all the way to Kurken Island just for materials.
normal_quests.flavor_text_after: I gave the craftsperson the materials they were after. They said they'd be on Kurken Island for a while longer. I should ask what sort of thing they're making.

normal_quests.title: Seeking Innovation 2
normal_quests.flavor_text: That Sardonican craftsperson apparently wants to make something with volcanic ore now. I've gathered it countless times, so this'll be a piece of cake.
normal_quests.flavor_text_after: I handed over the volcanic ore. With the craftsmanship of Sardonica, I'm sure they'll make something incredible! Maybe I should float the idea by Klaudia of selling volcanic ore as a Kurken souvenir.

event_condition.detail_text: Head to Weissberg Volcano.

normal_quests.flavor_text: That Sardonican craftsperson apparently wants to make something with volcanic ore now. I've gathered it countless times, so this'll be a piece of cake.

event_condition.detail_text: Gather 10 Crimson Ores.

normal_quests.flavor_text: That Sardonican craftsperson apparently wants to make something with volcanic ore now. I've gathered it countless times, so this'll be a piece of cake.

event_condition.detail_text: Deliver Crimson Ore to the craftsperson.

normal_quests.title: Ryza's Help Is Welcome
normal_quests.flavor_text: Agatha asked me to take care of some monsters. I said "That'll be no problem!" without a moment of hesitation. Maybe I'm getting the hang of this.
normal_quests.flavor_text_after: Agatha's request is all done! Now maybe I can focus on the Kark Isles. I need to get strong enough that I can handle lots and lots more requests from Agatha.

event_condition.detail_text: Head to Liese Valley.

achievement_condition.detail_text: Win 10 battles at the Liese Valley.

normal_quests.flavor_text: Alright, that wraps up that request. I should head back to Agatha! Doing this stuff every day would sure get exhausting. I don't envy guardians.

event_condition.detail_text: Report to Agatha.

normal_quests.title: The Aftermath of the Islands' Appearance
normal_quests.flavor_text: Ever since the Isles sprouted up, transport ships haven't been able to cross the waters. People are short on materials, so I should do whatever I can to help!
normal_quests.flavor_text_after: I brought materials since the transport ships aren't coming. I hope this helps a bit, but... We gotta do something about those islands, and fast.

normal_quests.title: Romy's Sense of Smell
normal_quests.flavor_text: Romy's curiosity for the rocky island can't be helped. But going near the island unprepared is a bad idea. I should go in stead.
normal_quests.flavor_text_after: It seems that her curiosity has been sated, but what was the deal with that altar? Maybe it just popped into existence like the isles, just the way Romy surmised.

event_condition.detail_text: Check the cavern on the rock island.

normal_quests.flavor_text: That altar gave me the creeps... Nothing there would excite Romy, so I'll just have to be honest with her.

event_condition.detail_text: Report to Romy.

normal_quests.title: Find the Missing Child
normal_quests.flavor_text: It seems the a child went to the Maple Delta alone. I remember going across the delta as a kid too, but that was when Lent and Tao were with me...
normal_quests.flavor_text_after: I got a reward for finding the lost child. I remember how mad Agatha was with me when I first went across the delta...

event_condition.detail_text: Search for missing child at Maple Delta.

normal_quests.title: Eliminate Monsters at the Old Castle
normal_quests.flavor_text: He's gonna buy Meteor Castle?! Nobles live in their own little universe... But there's absolutely no way of wiping out all the monsters. Not that I'll let that stop me from trying.
normal_quests.flavor_text_after: I'm glad I was honest with him. Job's done and I even got some materials out of the deal. But when I turned down his payment I could swear he muttered something under his breath...I wonder what it was?^00

achievement_condition.detail_text: Win 10 battles at the Meteor Castle.

normal_quests.flavor_text: As I thought, it's impossible... I wish he'd taken a look before asking. I'll have to tell him the truth.

event_condition.detail_text: Report to the nobleman.

normal_quests.title: Pamila's Triumphant Return
normal_quests.flavor_text: Pamela's back on Kurken Island! It's been a while since I heard about Sarding... She needs some ingredients though, so I better get to work.
normal_quests.flavor_text_after: I'll be able to make a ton of sarding with this! I can't wait to see how Bascila will react!

normal_quests.title: Samuel's Famous Sword
normal_quests.flavor_text: Why does Mom have Samuel's sword? It's all beat up now, but I hear it was once a glorious blade. With the power of alchemy, I can restore it!
normal_quests.flavor_text_after: It's just like Mom saidâ€”now that its restored to its old state, it's a magnificent blade! Lent may not like it but... I'm sure he is the one who has to use it to unleash its true power.

achievement_condition.detail_text: Synthesize Liese Divider.

normal_quests.title: Ruffian of the Waterfall
normal_quests.flavor_text: I heard there's a super powerful monster near the archipelago. It's causing problems for the fishermen whose livelihoods depend on what they catch there. We can't just ignore them, can we? Let's go check it out.
normal_quests.flavor_text_after: Tamed the monster that terrorized the fisherman with the power of the Summoner's Bell. It seems to be a good swimmer, so it might be very useful to call upon it when exploring underwater. Looking forward to working with you!

event_condition.detail_text: Explore the area around Waterfall Island

normal_quests.title: Major Cleanup of Crystal Cave
normal_quests.flavor_text: Saverio asked me to slay some monsters. I've been there before so I know the way, but I wonder what kind of monsters there might be. It shouldn't be an issue, but I should go prepared.
normal_quests.flavor_text_after: I told Saverio that the monsters are no more. Any great work comes with a bit of danger.

battle_condition.detail_text: Defeat monsters located where you picked up Scintilla Ore.

normal_quests.flavor_text: That's that! Now people should be able to come and go freely! I should go report back to Saverio.

event_condition.detail_text: Report to Saverio.

normal_quests.title: Made-to-Order Frame
normal_quests.flavor_text: Anna asked me to get some materials for a picture frame. Making one from scratch is pretty elaborate. If the picture is worth that much to her, I gotta do my best.
normal_quests.flavor_text_after: I gave Anna the picture frame materials. She was so happy it seemed like she was on the verge of tears. The thought of going through such effort to make the perfect frame for a picture is totally foreign to me.

achievement_condition.detail_text: Synthesize a Magna Mater with quality above 75.

normal_quests.flavor_text: Anna asked me to get some materials for a picture frame. Making one from scratch is pretty elaborate. If the picture is worth that much to her, I gotta do my best.

event_condition.detail_text: Deliver Magna Mater to Anna.

normal_quests.title: Request From a Closet Art Enthusiast
normal_quests.flavor_text: I did sell some stuff I made with alchemy to Romy, but is it really good enough that Anna would want it in her collection? In any case, let's get to work and make something great!
normal_quests.flavor_text_after: I gave Anna the art piece I made by imitation. I had no idea that Anna was such a fanatic collector. I think I might be done with art for a while... Making more would only lower the price, after all.

achievement_condition.detail_text: Synthesize a Depiction of a Devil with quality above 100.

normal_quests.flavor_text: I did sell some stuff I made with alchemy to Romy, but is it really good enough that Anna would want it in her collection? In any case, let's get to work and make something great!

event_condition.detail_text: Deliver Depiction of a Devil to Anna.

normal_quests.title: Where Did That Energy Go
normal_quests.flavor_text: I have been asked to clear out monsters from the bridge. Apparently they just keep coming, no matter how many times they're chased away. Since they're a tenacious bunch, it might be best to keep coming back and wait for them to show up.
normal_quests.flavor_text_after: I reported that the monsters are all gone. They may come back though, so it's probably best to visit the bridge again in a while.

battle_condition.detail_text: Defeat the monsters occupying the bridge.

normal_quests.flavor_text: The monsters from the bridge are all gone now! I should go tell the person who asked me to deal with them.

event_condition.detail_text: Report to the bridge manager.

normal_quests.title: Dreaming of the Market Revival
normal_quests.flavor_text: I was asked to get some materials to help restore the bridge. It's hard to believe that this place once had a bustling market. Let's lend a hand towards rebuilding it!
normal_quests.flavor_text_after: I brought the materials needed to rebuild the market! That's one step closer to a thriving shopping area. I hope I get to see the lines of stalls crowded with customers with my own eyes.

normal_quests.title: New and Super Precious Material
normal_quests.flavor_text: A Sardonican craftsperson asked me to get some suuuuuuuuper rare materials that can't be gathered in Sardonica. Some crystals that can only be found in the Underworld might just spark some inspiration.
normal_quests.flavor_text_after: I gave the craftsperson some crystals from the Underworld. That should get him out of his slump. Hmm, but what will he do when he's used all the crystals?

normal_quests.title: Bring Back the Market Manager
normal_quests.flavor_text: Apparently reviving this market will also require people. Someone who used to run a shop is below the bridge now. Let's go call them back!
normal_quests.flavor_text_after: Another step closer to reopening! I should come back in a couple days and see how things are progressing.

event_condition.detail_text: Talk to the business owner under the bridge.

normal_quests.flavor_text: As soon as I said the word, they went back onto the bridge! I should head back and report.

event_condition.detail_text: Report to the bridge manager.

normal_quests.title: Market Revival Coming Soon
normal_quests.flavor_text: Just when they were about to reopen the street stalls, there didn't seem to be any goods left in stock. I'll get you some items to sell.
normal_quests.flavor_text_after: I hope this much is enough. The staff and inventory should be ready to go now! After a few days, we'll finally be back in business.

normal_quests.title: Making the Market Main Attraction
normal_quests.flavor_text: Business doesn't appear to be booming... I've gotta stick with this through to the end! If I gather some local produce, they should be able to sell it as a featured item.
normal_quests.flavor_text_after: I brought the local goods to the market! Now the customers will come back for sure! I'll have to come shop here sometime.

normal_quests.title: The Recipe Sleeps at the Old Fairystone Silo
normal_quests.flavor_text: Alberta thinks that the Fairystone Silo located in the highlands was once an alchemist's laboratory. Maybe there's some amazing recipes left lying around! It's apparently infested with monsters now though, so I better go prepared.
normal_quests.flavor_text_after: Alberta let me have the recipe! It appears to be a recipe for a powerful weapon. I think it's time to hit the atelier and get synthesizing!

event_condition.detail_text: Check the old Fairystone silo.

normal_quests.flavor_text: There may not be any Fairystones left, but there was an incredibly advanced recipe. I should go report back to Alberta.

event_condition.detail_text: Report to Alberta.

normal_quests.title: Small Devils on the Road
normal_quests.flavor_text: It looks like monsters are after the merchant's goods. Stealing people's things is unforgivable! There are a bunch of them, so we'll just have to defeat them as we find them.
normal_quests.flavor_text_after: I got something really rare as a reward from the merchant! Just the sort of thing that could lure Small Devils near... I should watch out to make sure it doesn't get stolen.

battle_condition.detail_text: Defeat the monsters occupying the bridge.

normal_quests.flavor_text: I feel like we took out quite a few. Maybe now they'll learn their lesson. I should go tell the merchant.

event_condition.detail_text: Report to the merchant.

normal_quests.flavor_text: According to the merchant, the Small Devils have a leader giving them orders. If we take out their boss, their mischief will come to an end! It's tough, so we better not slack on preparation.

battle_condition.detail_text: Defeat the monsters occupying the bridge.

normal_quests.flavor_text: We managed to take down the boss. That should put an end to the Small Devils around here. I should let the merchant know.

event_condition.detail_text: Report to the merchant.

normal_quests.title: Take Back the Treasure
normal_quests.flavor_text: Did this boy go off to that crystal forest alone? I'm glad he's safe, but still... I think he lost his favorite doll, so let's go find it for him.
normal_quests.flavor_text_after: Delivered the doll to the boy. It looks so much like a monster. Maybe that doll attracted the monsters around it...

achievement_condition.detail_text: Search for the doll in the Spinel Forest.

normal_quests.flavor_text: We beat the monster and got the doll back! Let's go give it to the boy.

event_condition.detail_text: Deliver the doll to the boy.

normal_quests.title: Leave Delivery to Me!
normal_quests.flavor_text: Before I knew it, I had a delivery job. It sounds kind of fun! Let's go deliver food to the artisans at the mine.
normal_quests.flavor_text_after: Job complete! I earned a bit more than I expected. Still, it's only food delivery... I could probably make more in the capital.

event_condition.detail_text: Deliver Food to Customer

normal_quests.flavor_text: Delivery complete! Time to take the money back to the shop.

event_condition.detail_text: Report to Restaurant Staff

normal_quests.title: I've Got This One Too!
normal_quests.flavor_text: The shop's been really busy ever since, and now I've got 3 deliveries. The address looks to be Sardonica, but the location is unclear. I wonder if I'll be able to find it...
normal_quests.flavor_text_after: I guess my work is done now. They asked me if I wanted to go full-time, but I'm an alchemist by trade! It was an interesting experience, though.

event_condition.detail_text: Deliver Food to Customer (1)
Deliver Food to Customer (2)
Deliver Food to Customer (3)

normal_quests.flavor_text: I'm exhausted... but I finally made the deliveries. The job isn't done yet, though! I still have to go back to the shop to give them their money.

event_condition.detail_text: Report to Restaurant Staff

normal_quests.title: Not Enough Material for the Device!
normal_quests.flavor_text: It seems like he's missing ingots for some device. That's not a problem for me though! I should have enough materials for ingots...hopefully.
normal_quests.flavor_text_after: I handed over the materials for the device! But opening shop here? It seemed like a normal request so I wasn't sure if he was serious.

achievement_condition.detail_text: Synthesize an ingot with quality above 100.

normal_quests.flavor_text: It seems like he's missing ingots for some device. That's not a problem for me though! I should have enough materials for ingots...hopefully.

event_condition.detail_text: Deliver the ingot to the Chief.

normal_quests.title: Sympathy Among Countrymen
normal_quests.flavor_text: I'm from the boonies too, so I understand...yup. It gets so boring with nothing to do every day. I'll bring Deirdre something to spice things up!
normal_quests.flavor_text_after: Now she should be able to enjoy the sea's cuisine at will! Maybe I'll bring some more fresh fish when I get a chance.

normal_quests.title: Faurre's Famous General Store
normal_quests.flavor_text: Everyone seems to think we'll just do any old job... But we can't just let these fields be destroyed! Just this once, we'll step up and take care of it!
normal_quests.flavor_text_after: We drove out the monsters wrecking the fields! I think I've done my duty as a farmer's daughter. Maybe he's right. Maybe I should do something nice for my parents.

normal_quests.flavor_text: Everyone seems to think we'll just do any old job... But we can't just let these fields be destroyed! Just this once, we'll step up and take care of it!

event_condition.detail_text: Report to the villagers.

normal_quests.title: Let's Build a Bridge
normal_quests.flavor_text: The bridge seems to have gotten washed away by the rains. It would be nice to have it back. We should help rebuild it.
normal_quests.flavor_text_after: This should be enough to get the bridge back in order. We should come back in a few days and see if the bridge is back up.

normal_quests.title: Defend the Rangeland
normal_quests.flavor_text: So there are monsters lingering near the farm... Let's take'em out so the animals can roam free again.
normal_quests.flavor_text_after: According to Lent and Lila, there could be a possibility that monsters will keep showing up. Let's come back in a few days and check whether things are fine.

normal_quests.flavor_text: So there are monsters lingering near the farm... Let's take'em out so the animals can roam free again.

event_condition.detail_text: Report to Farm Manager.

normal_quests.title: Defend the Rangeland 2
normal_quests.flavor_text: It looks like they found the nest of the monsters near the farm! We must defeat the monsters to keep the milk tasting delicious!
normal_quests.flavor_text_after: Now they can safely pasture their animals again! I wonder how the milk is going to taste...

normal_quests.flavor_text: Once their leader is gone, the animals should be safe to pasture! Let's go back and report to the farmer.

event_condition.detail_text: Report to Farm Manager.

normal_quests.title: Take This if You're Tired
normal_quests.flavor_text: Chief seems a bit tired... But that medicine ought to perk him right up.
normal_quests.flavor_text_after: I gave Chief that medicine and he lit up right away! Given how much there is in the village for me to deal with, maybe I should make an extra batch for myself.

achievement_condition.detail_text: Prepare Golden Hearts with quality above 80.

normal_quests.flavor_text: Chief seems a bit tired... But that medicine ought to perk him right up.

event_condition.detail_text: Deliver a Golden Heart to the Chief.

normal_quests.title: A Breath of the Sea to Faurre
normal_quests.flavor_text: I can kinda see how you would get tired of the same old dishes living up in the mountains. I couldn't stand living in the countryside so I left. I'll bring some of the sea's bounty to calm this lady's nerves.
normal_quests.flavor_text_after: Bringing some seafood seems to have put her at ease for the moment. I shudder to think what would happen if I were any later...

normal_quests.title: A Silly Lovers' Quarrel
normal_quests.flavor_text: He's been gone for three whole days? He really doesn't want to give in, huh? I've gotta go tell him to get his butt back here!
normal_quests.flavor_text_after: They're getting along better than ever. And I got some sweet stuff in return, all in a day's work.

event_condition.detail_text: Search for the adventurers in the foggy forest.

normal_quests.flavor_text: Alright! I'm glad I managed to find her friend. I wonder if they made up... I should go check.

event_condition.detail_text: Go see how the adventurers are doing.

normal_quests.title: A Request to Investigate the Temple
normal_quests.flavor_text: Apparently, there are some documents on Nemed left in the shrine. There might be something on the people of the Age of God there too, let's go find out! Looks like monsters have moved inâ€”better go prepared.
normal_quests.flavor_text_after: He gave me the recipe for a powerful weapon! I'd say it's time to get synthesizing back at the atelier.

event_condition.detail_text: Search for books in the Lingering Fontanel.

normal_quests.flavor_text: The documents we were after were full of info we already knew. But on the positive side, we found an awesome recipe! I should report back to the Chief.

event_condition.detail_text: Report to the Chief.

normal_quests.title: Blossoming the Flowers of the Human World
normal_quests.flavor_text: Maybe flowers can grow here in the Underworld! Let's bring them some flowers so they can have a taste of our world!
normal_quests.flavor_text_after: I gave them some flowers that grow in our world. I hope the flowers I gave them manage to bloom.

normal_quests.title: A Special Gift from Hometown
normal_quests.flavor_text: It seems that Kilo has an interest in Kurken Island. In that case, the best thing I could give her would be a Kurken Fruit!
normal_quests.flavor_text_after: Kilo got to taste Kurken Fruit for the first time! It was meant to help out Bos a bit, so I hope it went alright.

normal_quests.title: Fi's Appeal
normal_quests.flavor_text: Fi warned us about the Philuscha attack! We have to drive them back for Fi!
normal_quests.flavor_text_after: I got a thank-you present from Fi! I'll treasure it! I'd love to be able to speak with Fi in his own language some day.

battle_condition.detail_text: Defeat the Philuscha who invaded the garden of Fairy of Solace.

normal_quests.flavor_text: Great, it should be safe now. I should go let Fi know. But how do I say "safe" in Fi's language? Maybe "Fifififi" or "Fiifi"? I think it's one of those...

event_condition.detail_text: Report to Fi.

normal_quests.title: Preparing for Battle Against the Philuscha
normal_quests.flavor_text: I'll prepare some quality armor to make dispatching the Philuscha an easy task. That armor is strong and I can make a bunch.
normal_quests.flavor_text_after: I gave them the armor I made! Hopefully this takes off some of their burden.

normal_quests.title: Professional Exterminator of Philuscha Nests
normal_quests.flavor_text: I've been asked to eradicate Philuscha lairs. I've never seen an overflow of Philuscha before. I should probably cull their numbers so that I never have to.
normal_quests.flavor_text_after: That should slow down the Philuscha overflow for a bit. The nests will probably be back. I should return in a while to check on them.

normal_quests.flavor_text: That should be almost all of the Philuscha lairs! I should let that warrior know.

event_condition.detail_text: Report to the warrior of the Wave Tuner clan.

normal_quests.title: The Era Before the Age of God
normal_quests.flavor_text: The Philuscha have made a nest of some ruins that are precious to the Wave Tuner clan. And it seems there is a King Philuscha as well, so that's where we come in.
normal_quests.flavor_text_after: Now that the Philuscha have fled the ruins, it should be easier to come and go! This place holds a lot of memories for Kala, so I'm glad that we could help.

battle_condition.detail_text: Defeat the King Philuscha at the Guardian's Altar.

normal_quests.flavor_text: That was close, but we beat the King in the end... Let's go report back to the guard.

event_condition.detail_text: Report to the gatekeeper of the ruins.

normal_quests.title: A Gift to a Late Young Brother
normal_quests.flavor_text: To think that someone can't even visit a grave due to the Philuscha threat... If she doesn't mind, perhaps we can go in her stead?
normal_quests.flavor_text_after: I totally forgot how much longer they live than us... Anyway, I'm glad we could help pay a visit to his grave. Maybe we should work on reducing the Philuscha's numbers so that she can go freely next year.

event_condition.detail_text: Place 10 flowers on the grave.

normal_quests.flavor_text: I took the flowers to her brother's grave. Now that the year's visit is complete, I should go let her know.

event_condition.detail_text: Report that you have visited the grave.

normal_quests.title: Protect the Line of Defense
normal_quests.flavor_text: Fighting the Philuscha every single day must be hard... I'll make some nice weapons for them to make it a tad bit easier.
normal_quests.flavor_text_after: With something this sturdy, it should hold up to any number of battles! We could fight the Philuscha too, to help lighten the load.

normal_quests.title: The Scent of Flower Gardens to the Sanctuary
normal_quests.flavor_text: Kilo actually likes the smell of flowers. Maybe she'll appreciate it if I make some perfume for her.
normal_quests.flavor_text_after: I gave Kilo the perfume. Maybe I'll get Bos to come by while she's wearing it...

achievement_condition.detail_text: Synthesize a Rose Perfume with quality above 80.

normal_quests.flavor_text: Kilo actually likes the smell of flowers. Maybe she'll appreciate it if I make some perfume for her.

event_condition.detail_text: Deliver Rose Perfume to Kilo.

normal_quests.title: Let's Heal This Tough World
normal_quests.flavor_text: It looks like they got hurt fighting Philuscha... I have to brew up some medicine to help them, and quick.
normal_quests.flavor_text_after: Oh thank goodness... The wounds have healed. We should be careful when we fight the Philuscha as well.

achievement_condition.detail_text: Synthesize a Nectar with quality above 80.

normal_quests.flavor_text: It looks like they got hurt fighting Philuscha... I have to brew up some medicine to help them, and quick.

event_condition.detail_text: Deliver Nectar to the warrior on guard duty.

normal_quests.title: Turf War
normal_quests.flavor_text: This place is really beautiful! Since we're in the area, let's go have a look at the crystals around here.
normal_quests.flavor_text_after: I got some valuable materials in return. If they are found around here, I should search for some.

event_condition.detail_text: Go see the crystals.

normal_quests.title: An Unexpected Fishing Contest
normal_quests.flavor_text: I won't lose to Lent and Tao! I'll find a spot where I can reel in a big one.
normal_quests.flavor_text_after: And the best fisher is...me! And I won't lose next time either!

event_condition.detail_text: Fish for some time at a place where you can catch big fishes.

normal_quests.title: A Suspicious Silo
normal_quests.flavor_text: There's a monster in front of the Fairystone Silo! It looks strong, but should we slay it?
normal_quests.flavor_text_after: I wonder what could be stored inside? We should take a look some time.

event_condition.detail_text: Defeat the monsters in front of the old Fairystone silo.

normal_quests.title: To Where the Railroad Leads
normal_quests.flavor_text: I don't think I've ever seen so many Fairystones in one place. I use these for alchemy, so let's gather some.
normal_quests.flavor_text_after: Gathering complete! I'll be back if I need more Fairystones.

achievement_condition.detail_text: Gather 5 Fairystone Fragments.

normal_quests.title: A Slacker?
normal_quests.flavor_text: Slacking off of work? That won't do! They said he went west, so let's go tell him to come back.
normal_quests.flavor_text_after: So, he was slacking off after all! If I see him again, I'm gonna smack him real good.

event_condition.detail_text: Call back the worker west of the rest area.

normal_quests.title: Lost and Found
normal_quests.flavor_text: Is that the camper? We should go ask why he's here all alone.
normal_quests.flavor_text_after: Oh good, the pendant is safe and sound! I should take care not to drop anything myself.

event_condition.detail_text: Follow the person who seems to be the tent's owner.

normal_quests.flavor_text: It must be a pretty precious pendant to warrant searching for it all alone. Well, let's help him find it!

achievement_condition.detail_text: Search for the pendant.

normal_quests.flavor_text: It must be a pretty precious pendant to warrant searching for it all alone. Well, let's help him find it!

normal_quests.title: The Forest with Sleeping Resources
normal_quests.flavor_text: There must be some interesting ingredients in such a lush forest as this. Let's see if there's anything I can use in my alchemy.
normal_quests.flavor_text_after: Where there's danger, there's quality materials. Now then, let's go somewhere else.

event_condition.detail_text: Gather ingredients at the Spinel Forest.

normal_quests.title: Incoming Heat
normal_quests.flavor_text: Ugh...it's so hot... Let's just get some ingredients...and get out of here...
normal_quests.flavor_text_after: I managed to get some ingredients at least. I wonder what's on the other side of that boulder, but let's just go for now.

event_condition.detail_text: Gather ingredients in front of the lava tunnel.

normal_quests.title: Dian's Treasure Hunting
normal_quests.flavor_text: Let's go hunt for treasure in Faurre. It looks like there are 3 in total... I wonder what sort of things the kid hid.
normal_quests.flavor_text_after: We found all the treasure! This will surely serve us on our adventure! But I would not have guessed that Dian had such a talent with the little ones.

achievement_condition.detail_text: Search for the treasure hidden by the boy.

normal_quests.flavor_text: I guess that's all the treasure. Let's report to the boy.

event_condition.detail_text: Report to the boy.

normal_quests.title: The Untapped Resources in the Forest
normal_quests.flavor_text: That ferocious sound... It must be a monster! Let's hurry and go see.
normal_quests.flavor_text_after: We helped out the Gleaner warrior. Maybe the power of the Dragon Tree called monsters to it. I should look around again, if I get a chance.

event_condition.detail_text: Head to the monsters.

normal_quests.title: Mana of Ore
normal_quests.flavor_text: It looks like monsters are living in front of the mine. We have to clear them out in order to restart the ore operation!
normal_quests.flavor_text_after: Now people can freely use the mine! If this ore has enough power to draw monsters to it, it should serve us on our adventure.

achievement_condition.detail_text: Defeat monsters blocking the mining site.

normal_quests.flavor_text: We took out the monsters in front of the mine! I should report back.

event_condition.detail_text: Report that you have defeated the monster.

normal_quests.title: The Mystery Illuminated by the Lighthouse
normal_quests.flavor_text: It looks like Lent wants to go up the lighthouse. And now I'm kinda interested too. Just a peek.
normal_quests.flavor_text_after: There was treasure inside the pirate ship! Lent's intuition is brilliant. But where's the ship from...?

event_condition.detail_text: Go to the top of the lighthouse.

normal_quests.flavor_text: Hey, that's a pirate ship way over there, isn't it? There might be something inside, let's go see!

event_condition.detail_text: Explore the pirate ship.

normal_quests.title: Flower Picking Is on Us
normal_quests.flavor_text: They went to pick flowers, but the monsters might pluck them first. I'll go instead and bring some back.
normal_quests.flavor_text_after: I picked some flowers for them! I hope they help with the plant research.

event_condition.detail_text: Gather 5 Sunny Honey Flower.

normal_quests.title: What Can We See From the Hill?
normal_quests.flavor_text: From high above, looking around, I spied a glimmer in the sea. It's intriguing, let's go take a look!
normal_quests.flavor_text_after: We went to the glimmering spot and, what do you know, we found a valuable material! This will surely serve us on our adventure.

event_condition.detail_text: Check the shining object.

normal_quests.title: Trial at the Land of Three Swords
normal_quests.flavor_text: It's a strong looking knight. But we won't lose to anyone! Let me show you what we can do!
normal_quests.flavor_text_after: We beat the knight that showed up! If we keep this up, we'll be done exploring in no time!

event_condition.detail_text: Defeat the knight at the Three Sword Land.

normal_quests.title: Let's Stop the Earthquake!
normal_quests.flavor_text: The source of the quaking earth looks to be that Wyrm. If we leave it be, it'll cause the volcano to erupt. We gotta beat it.
normal_quests.flavor_text_after: We defeated the Wyrm that was causing the earthquakes! Man, if we didn't come here when we did, things could have gotten way worse.

event_condition.detail_text: Defeat the Wyrm that is causing the earthquakes.

normal_quests.title: What the Wreckage Shows
normal_quests.flavor_text: Tao seems to be utterly enthralled by the remnants of ancient wars. Maybe I can gather some things while he investigates.
normal_quests.flavor_text_after: We're all done checking the wall, but the sad history of this place has become painfully clear... I've got what I can, so let's look somewhere else.

event_condition.detail_text: Gather materials at the Collapsed Wall.

normal_quests.title: Investigating the Scars of War
normal_quests.flavor_text: As soon as we checked the debris, monsters popped out! Tao was just getting worked up and you had to go and spoil it!
normal_quests.flavor_text_after: We beat the monsters that showed up! And we got some info on the weapon stockpile. Tao seems satisfied.

event_condition.detail_text: Defeat monsters in the ruins.

normal_quests.title: Lessons From Ruins
normal_quests.flavor_text: This wall is massive... This needs investigating. Let's check for any cracks like Dian suggested.
normal_quests.flavor_text_after: We found out about the history of the ruins in Faurre. This fortress was used to escape conflict, just like Kurken Island. It's just like Tao said, we have to retell the follies of the past to avoid repeating them.

event_condition.detail_text: Check the area along the wall of the Central Blockade Area.

normal_quests.flavor_text: Thanks to what we learned from the other ruins, we now know that the giant fortress to the west was used as an evacuation site. Let's go and find out if Tao's suspicion is correct.

event_condition.detail_text: Head to the decaying fort.

normal_quests.title: What Frightens the Underworld
normal_quests.flavor_text: Speak of the devil, Philuscha attack! Let's head in the direction of the bell's chime!
normal_quests.flavor_text_after: Phew, now we don't have to worry any more. Kala gave us something for getting rid of the Philuscha. I ought to synthesize it into something to aid our adventure.

event_condition.detail_text: Head to the northeast of the village.

normal_quests.title: Investigating the Cavern One More Time
normal_quests.flavor_text: We heard a fearsome growl from the Cavern of Insanity... It's scary, but it's for the good of the villageâ€”we have to look.
normal_quests.flavor_text_after: I can't believe a stray King would take over a nest... Maybe the Deranger made it lose its mind.

event_condition.detail_text: Investigate the voice in the Cavern of Insanity.

normal_quests.title: Feel the Great Tree's Life Energy
normal_quests.flavor_text: There are no trees this big on Kurken! We should get closer and feel its power.
normal_quests.flavor_text_after: I thought it might be polluted, but it's not at all! This tree is full of life! Since we're here, we might as well gather all this wood.

event_condition.detail_text: Get close to the Great Tree of the Underworld.

normal_quests.title: Attracted to the Light of Mana
normal_quests.flavor_text: You just took the bones out of the Dragon Shrine, right? Let's go and give proper thanks.
normal_quests.flavor_text_after: It was brimming with magical light, just like Kala said! And that has suffused into the surrounding materials as well. I'll be taking these.

event_condition.detail_text: Head to the Old Dragon Shrine.

normal_quests.title: Stone Tower Conservation Project
normal_quests.flavor_text: Toppling stone towers are incredibly dangerous! If we're going to rebuild it with normal ore, we gotta get to work gathering!
normal_quests.flavor_text_after: These reinforcements should serve to prevent it from falling over. I need to hone my skills more so I can rebuild even these towers!

event_condition.detail_text: Take 30 ores to the stone tower.

normal_quests.title: Chasing and Defeating the Philuscha
normal_quests.flavor_text: An incredibly powerful Philuscha is on the run, it seems. If we don't do something, the village could be in danger! Let's take it out and restore peace to the village.
normal_quests.flavor_text_after: We put the runaway Philuscha to rest. We defeated the Spring of Insanity, but it seems its effect still lingers. Even though we have an advantageous position, we need to fight with caution.

normal_quests.flavor_text: An incredibly powerful Philuscha is on the run, it seems. If we don't do something, the village could be in danger! Let's take it out and restore peace to the village.

event_condition.detail_text: Report to the gatekeeper of the ruins.

normal_quests.title: A Surprise from the Blue Life Spring
normal_quests.flavor_text: Did it resonate with us? I felt an incredible life force from the tree. Light sprang forth from other spots tooâ€”we should go check!
normal_quests.flavor_text_after: There were some materials I've never seen before where the light was shining! It must be a gift from that spring! We'll be sure to make good use of it.

event_condition.detail_text: Search for gifts on the island with ruins.

normal_quests.title: The Institute's Legacy
normal_quests.flavor_text: Federica found something that looked like a treasure map. She and Dian took off with it... But there are bound to be monsters along the way. We'll take care as we go.
normal_quests.flavor_text_after: After defeating the monster, there really was a treasure chest! Federica ended up finding both the map and the treasure, much to Dian's disappointment. They became good friends.

event_condition.detail_text: Explore area marked on the treasure map.

normal_quests.title: Classroom Learning Is Important!
normal_quests.flavor_text: Dian fell asleep when Empel begun explaining... No surprises there... I'll whip up some medicine that will keep him awake!
normal_quests.flavor_text_after: Just when I thought we were trying to help Dian become a better student... Empel had to open his big mouth! Maybe my awakening potion reminded him of the old days... Whoops.

achievement_condition.detail_text: Prepare a Nectar with quality of 300 or higher.

normal_quests.flavor_text: I hope the quality is high enough. Okay, let's give the medicine awakening properties!

achievement_condition.detail_text: Add the "Sleep Cure" trait to the Nectar.

normal_quests.flavor_text: My special awakening medicine is ready! I used to make it for when Empel's stories were putting me to sleep... But enough about that! I'll give this to Dian.

normal_quests.title: True Meaning of Botanical Research
normal_quests.flavor_text: I think they did some plant research at this facility. Maybe they were trying to reforest the desert? Let's take a look at the lab with Kala.
normal_quests.flavor_text_after: It seems like it would be pretty difficult to reforest this much desert. In fact, it's still full of sand and inhabited by monsters. Maybe they gave up and left?

event_condition.detail_text: Go to the botany lab.

normal_quests.title: Birdwatcher Tao
normal_quests.flavor_text: I think the blue bird we sometimes see is also here on Rosca Island. Tao seems fascinated. Is it a scientific curiosity, as Patty says? If we see the bird while exploring, we'll try to follow it!
normal_quests.flavor_text_after: In the end, Tao wasn't able to figure out that bird. Kala said something strange, but she was strangely persuasive... Maybe we should just consider it a lucky omen!

achievement_condition.detail_text: Following the Guiding Bird on Rosca Island 1.
Following the Guiding Bird on Rosca Island 2.
Following the Guiding Bird on Rosca Island 3.

normal_quests.flavor_text: We found the blue bird a few times! It led us to a lot of places, but Tao still wasn't satisfied. He wants to go back to the atelier on Rosca Island to make sense of things.

event_condition.detail_text: Return to the atelier on Rosca Island.

normal_quests.title: Collecting Texts
normal_quests.flavor_text: It seems that Kala wants to translate the documents from Rosca Island for the Wave Tuner Clan. The information here must be valuable! I'll report back to Kala if I find anything.
normal_quests.flavor_text_after: I gave the texts I found to Kala so she could make copies of the translation to send to Windle. I also have a few copies that I'll bring with me when I go to the Underworld.

achievement_condition.detail_text: Searching for Texts on Rosca Island.

normal_quests.flavor_text: It seems that Kala wants to translate the documents from Rosca Island for the Wave Tuner Clan. The information here must be valuable! I'll report back to Kala if I find anything.

event_condition.detail_text: Report to Kala.

normal_quests.title: Collecting Texts 2
normal_quests.flavor_text: I think there's still more undiscovered texts here besides what I gave to Kala. I'll give whatever I find to her.
normal_quests.flavor_text_after: I gave my findings to Kala. We looked around quite a bit, and I think we managed to collect at least half of them? Kala made another copy for me, so I'll hold onto that, too.

achievement_condition.detail_text: Searching for Texts on Rosca Island.

normal_quests.flavor_text: I think there's still more undiscovered texts here besides what I gave to Kala. I'll give whatever I find to her.

event_condition.detail_text: Report to Kala.

normal_quests.title: Collecting Texts 3
normal_quests.flavor_text: We're almost there! Let's find the rest of the documents and report back to Kala. There are some tough monsters here, but if things seem too difficult, we'll go to the atelier and get ready first.
normal_quests.flavor_text_after: This much information ought to make the people in the Underworld happy! Come to think of it, since Kala has escaped from the Underworld, maybe it would be easier to return with a souvenir...? Um, never mind.

achievement_condition.detail_text: Searching for Texts on Rosca Island.

normal_quests.flavor_text: We're almost there! Let's find the rest of the documents and report back to Kala. There are some tough monsters here, but if things seem too difficult, we'll go to the atelier and get ready first.

event_condition.detail_text: Report to Kala.

normal_quests.title: Dian's Fighting Spirit
normal_quests.flavor_text: Monsters were running amok in the facility, and Dian seemed very serious about fighting them. It looks like he has a reason, so let's defeat them together.
normal_quests.flavor_text_after: As someone whose living has been supported by ruins, Dian felt he needed to protect this place as well... All right! Now that we have some raw monster, let's treat Dian to a delicious meal!

event_condition.detail_text: Defeat monsters ravaging the facility.

normal_quests.title: Ore of Harmony
normal_quests.flavor_text: Federica showed me some ore I've never seen before. It seems to be very valuable. Federica wants to collect more, so I'll find some good quality pieces for her.
normal_quests.flavor_text_after: I gave Federica the ametrite. I'm sure the artisans at Sardonica will be surprised. The more samples the better, so I might take some with me when I visit Sardonica.

delivery_condition.detail_text: Deliver Ametrite with quality of 100 or higher.

normal_quests.title: Researching Puni
normal_quests.flavor_text: I met a man who is looking for rare puniballs. He said they run away fast, but were there really puni like that? If I see one, I should chase it down with my spirit beast or slide.
normal_quests.flavor_text_after: I'm glad he's pleased with the puniballs! And it looks like he'll sell some to me. They're expensive, but they're pretty good quality, so I think I'll buy them as synthesis ingredients.

achievement_condition.detail_text: Collecting Golden Puniballs.

normal_quests.flavor_text: I finally managed to collect some puniballs... I've never seen puni this fast before! Now, let's go deliver them to the researcher!

event_condition.detail_text: Deliver Golden Puniball.

normal_quests.title: Heart of a Warrior
normal_quests.flavor_text: There's a warrior who's down on his luck, and he doesn't seem to be taking requests at the moment. When I suggested exercise as a distraction, he just gave me a note... Is that all? Guess I'll do it anyway.
normal_quests.flavor_text_after: I delivered what was asked for. Will it really make him feel better? I can't imagine what he's going to do with it... Maybe I'll check back later to see how things are going.

delivery_condition.detail_text: Deliver Puni Leather with quality of 300 or higher.
Deliver Giant Puniball with quality of 150 or higher.

normal_quests.title: Heart of a Warrior 2
normal_quests.flavor_text: The warrior made a dummy and then beat the living daylights out of it! Maybe it's working? He still doesn't want to accept the monster-slaying request, though. We can't just ignore it, so we'll do it for him.
normal_quests.flavor_text_after: We told the warrior that we defeated the monster. We got the reward, but what about the next request? I can't help but worry, so let's go back and check on him.

normal_quests.flavor_text: I think we took care of the monster in the request. Since we didn't speak to the client ourselves, let's report to the warrior for now.

event_condition.detail_text: Report to the warrior.

normal_quests.title: Heart of a Warrior 3
normal_quests.flavor_text: The warrior seems to have made up his mind to take up requests once again after what we did. I'm glad to see that he's made a full recovery. To celebrate, I'm going to make a special weapon!
normal_quests.flavor_text_after: I gave the warrior my special sword! Something this powerful should take care of most monsters. Even after we leave here, we can rest easy knowing that he's still around.

delivery_condition.detail_text: Deliver an Unfold with quality of 500 or higher.

normal_quests.title: Crush in Cleria
normal_quests.flavor_text: I didn't know there were students from the capital in this village. The girl he talked about is in Cleria. He is having troubles writing a letter to her, so I'll prepare a medicine that might help.
normal_quests.flavor_text_after: If he takes this, he should be able to think clearly again! I'll check in on him once he's finished writing his letter.

event_condition.detail_text: Deliver a medicine with the "Free Spirit" trait.

normal_quests.title: Crush in Cleria 2
normal_quests.flavor_text: I got the letter! But I don't know where I should look for the girl... It sounds like she's somewhere in Sardonica, so I'll ask everyone I see who looks like a student!
normal_quests.flavor_text_after: I gave him the reply, but it said just to come to Sardonica. Hmmm, does that mean she wants a face-to-face confession? I guess it's up to the guy to decide what to do.

event_condition.detail_text: Look for the girl in Sardonica 1.
Look for the girl in Sardonica 2.
Look for the girl in Sardonica 3.

normal_quests.flavor_text: There are so many beautiful women in Sardonica, but who's the right one...? If we give up, his feelings will never be known! I heard about a place that might be it, let's check it out!

event_condition.detail_text: Look for the girl in Sardonica 4.

normal_quests.flavor_text: At last... I finally found her. I didn't expect the feelings to be mutual! I got a reply, so let's go back and deliver it to the student.

event_condition.detail_text: Deliver the letter to the young man on the capital's outskirts.

normal_quests.title: Crush in Cleria 3
normal_quests.flavor_text: The student finally made up his mind to go to Sardonica. He wants to bring an expensive souvenir. I could buy it for him secretly, or maybe I could synthesize it? Either way, I'll give him one last push.
normal_quests.flavor_text_after: I gave the student his souvenir! But in the end, I think if he's just honest about his feelings, everything will be fine. Best of luck in Sardonica!

achievement_condition.detail_text: Prepare a Locket of Devotion with quality of 500 or higher.

normal_quests.flavor_text: The student finally made up his mind to go to Sardonica. He wants to bring an expensive souvenir. I could buy it for him secretly, or maybe I could synthesize it? Either way, I'll give him one last push.

event_condition.detail_text: Deliver the Locket of Devotion.
